products.title: Konya Blackout Putty Beige
products.metadescription: Made to measure konya blackout putty beige roller blind | privacy, thermal fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya blackoutputty beigeplain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.

products.title: Ash Rose Honeycomb Blackout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Ash rose honeycomb blackout perfect fit
products.productdescription: Have you been struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fits blinds are a great way to cover each pane, whislt giving you style and privacy at the same time. The blackout pleated fabric will gently filter the light coming into your room, whislt still giving you privacy.  Stuggling to cover your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no drilling required! All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more.

products.title: Luna Blackout Taupe Beige Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure luna blackout taupe beige perfect fit pleated blind px72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Luna blackouttaupe beige perfect fit pleated blind. Part of ourluna blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "luna blackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
